Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 7th overall pick, by Troy in 1985...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1986, off Mickey Tussler (WT)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/12/1986, off Kevin Coleman (DIA)...
Injured on 6/21/1986 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Had 5 hits with 8 RBI against Ashburn on 7/16/1986...
Hit 3 homeruns against Ashburn, driving in 8 runs on 7/16/1986...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Ashburn on 4/21/1987...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Ashburn on 8/26/1989...
Won World Championship with Troy in 1989...
Hit 3 homeruns against Halifax, driving in 4 runs on 7/9/1991...
Signed as a free agent by Pontiac on 2/17/1992 to a 3-year deal worth $2,463,400 per year...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Had 7 hits with 4 RBI against Malibu on 4/9/1993...
